content: @Kevin Buzzard, did you mean to exclude this lemma from the exercise?
Because to prove it, it seems like I also need ring.neg_mul, ring.zero_mul, and possibly some other lemmas not currently present in that file
I think I proved it for commutative rings when I was going through it but I might have changed it to rings at the last minute :-)
OK I changed it back to commutative rings ;-)
